scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && poetry run uvicorn src.main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && poetry run uvicorn src.main:app --port 8000
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:frontend:coverage && npm run test:backend:coverage
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && poetry run black . && poetry run isort .
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && poetry run black . && poetry run isort .
scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && poetry install
scripts.precommit: npm run lint && CI=true npm run test:frontend
